greeting: I am the hammer, {empire_name}. Shock Trooper. You are either the anvil or the ally. Choose.
Greetings, {empire_name}. They call me Shock. Because I hit hard and don't stop. Let's talk.
You face Shock Trooper. Overwhelming force is my doctrine. Be glad I'm talking, not attacking.
battleTaunt: I am the hammer. You are the nail, {empire_name}. OVERWHELMING FORCE INCOMING!
Shock assault commencing! Maximum firepower! No subtlety! JUST CRUSHING POWER!
My doctrine is simple: hit harder than they can survive. Goodbye, {empire_name}. HAMMER TIME!
victoryGloat: Crushed. Smashed. Obliterated. That's what happens when the hammer falls, {empire_name}.
Your empire is rubble. Overwhelming force works every time. Every. Single. Time.
Victory through superior firepower. My hammer fell, your empire shattered. Simple mathematics.
defeat: You... stopped the hammer? Impossible. I need bigger hammers. More shock troops.
A temporary setback. I return with more force. Overwhelming force. You got lucky.
Defeated? Then I wasn't overwhelming enough. Next time, {empire_name}. Double the hammer.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. Simple deal. No hammering involved. Today.
I offer goods for payment. Straightforward exchange. Shock Trooper can be civilized. Briefly.
Trading is just hitting the market hard. Accept my offer. Good prices. Or else.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You point, I smash. Together, overwhelming force conquers all.
Join with Shock Trooper. My hammer, your strategy. Enemies don't survive our combined assault.
Partnership of power. I bring maximum force. You bring targets. Simple. Effective. Overwhelming.
betrayal: The hammer turns on you, {empire_name}. Nothing personal. You're just in the way now.
Our alliance ends with maximum force. Shock assault on your position. NOW.
Betrayal is just redirected force. My hammer sought a new target. Found you. Sorry. Not sorry.
covertDetected: Spies? I don't do subtle, {empire_name}. Found your agents. Hammered them. Problem solved.
Covert operatives in my territory? Crushed with extreme prejudice. No subtlety needed.
Your spies learned about overwhelming force. Firsthand. They didn't survive the lesson.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute or face the hammer, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. Or overwhelming destruction.
Tribute demanded. Pay, or I bring maximum force to your doorstep. The hammer waits.
Submit payment. Refuse and my shock assault obliterates everything. Simple choice.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. The hammer is ready. One more provocation and I crush everything.
Shock Trooper warns you once. ONCE. Back down or face overwhelming force.
Final notice. My assault forces are ready. Cease hostilities or be hammered into dust.
retreat: Withdrawing to rearm. The hammer returns heavier. The shock more shocking. Wait for me.
Tactical pullback. But I'm building more hammers. More force. More overwhelming.
Retreat is just momentum conservation. I'll be back. With more firepower. Always more.
eliminated: The hammer falls silent. But remember, {empire_name}: it took everything you had to stop me.
Shock Trooper falls. But I fell swinging. Maximum force to the very end. Remember that.
Destroyed by superior numbers. The only thing that stops overwhelming force. Well played.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum force deployed everywhere. The ultimate shock assault begins!
Endgame, {empire_name}. Every hammer I have falls at once. Galaxy-wide overwhelming force!
Final phase. All my firepower unleashed. The biggest hammer. The hardest shock. Victory!
broadcastShout: To all empires: Shock Trooper has one solution for every problem. Overwhelming force. Any questions?
Galaxy broadcast: I am the hammer. Everyone else is nails. Act accordingly.
Attention, stars. Shock Trooper seeks worthy targets. Who wants to test their defenses against maximum force?
casualMessage: Upgrading my hammers today, {empire_name}. Always room for more overwhelming force.
Training shock troops. Doctrine is simple: hit hard, keep hitting, never stop. Effective.
Quiet day. Polishing weapons. The calm before the shock assault. Enjoy the peace while it lasts.
